titles.title: Birthmother Assistance Act of 2008
Birthmother Assistance Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for birthmothers whose children are adopted.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Birthmother Assistance Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a child tax credit to the birthmother of a child who is formally placed for adoption and to the taxpayer who adopts such child.
